content: * 5 times taking the loops behind the lamé petals row 2 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 4tr 1 picot ch3 slip_stitch to first chain 4tr 1 half_double_crochet 1dc into each of the 6 loops fasten_off yarn and weave in ends attach safety pin to back of flower helène marcy / eclatdusoleil 2007 pattern for personal use only page 2/3 orange and yellow flower row 1 2 double_crochet into front loop of each double_crochet of materials required previous row cid 1 about 20g yarn e g idéal de bergère row 2 3 dtr into front loop of each double_crochet of de france as used here previous row cid 1 safety pin or brooch back row 3 * 3 double_crochet picot chain 3 slip_stitch to first cid 1 3 5 mm crochet hook chain repeat from * around cid 1 yarn or tapestry needle fasten_off yellow yarn and weave in ends orange petals instructions pick up orange yarn again flower centre row 1 working into back loops of first row with the orange yarn ch3 slip_stitch to form of yellow double_crochet 2tr into each double_crochet around ring row 2 2 treble_crochet into each treble_crochet of previous row work 12 half_double_crochet into the ring slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet row 3 * 3 double_crochet picot chain 3 slip_stitch to first work 2 further row of 12 double_crochet chain repeat from * around yellow petals fasten_off yarn and weave in ends join the yellow yarn without breaking off attach safety pin to back of flower the orange yarn design hélène marcy / eclatdusoleil - http //de-fil-en-aiguille blogspot com/ translation claire beechey claire-evelyn on ravelry - http //www ravelry com/people/claire-evelyn copyright free pattern under creative commons license - attribution-noncommercial-share alike 2 0 http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2 0/fr/ this pattern is intended for personal use only the sale of item based on this pattern is permitted as long as it is sold as a single item or custom order and clearly mentions that it is made based on a design from hélène marcy / eclatdusoleil to sell distribute or produce and sell more than one item made from this pattern you have to obtain the direct written consent of hélène marcy eclatdusoleil@gmail com helène marcy / eclatdusoleil 2007 pattern for personal use only page 3/3
